trans-unit.source: Provides a framework for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> elements that virtualize their child data collection.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 프레임 워크를 제공 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 자신의 자식 데이터 컬렉션을 가상화 하는 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.

In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: "이러한 맥락에서 가상화" 나타냅니다는 기술 기준인의 하위 집합 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 요소가 화면에 표시 되는 항목에 따라 데이터 항목의 많은 수에서 생성 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time.
trans-unit.target: 메모리와 프로세서를 많이 생성 측면에서 비효율적 없으면 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 일부만 지정된 된 시간에 화면에 있을 수 있는 경우 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A panel that inherits from VirtualizingPanel, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>, calculates visible items and works with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) to only create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements for visible items.
trans-unit.target: 와 같은 VirtualizingPanel에서 상속 하는 패널을는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>, 표시 되는 항목을 계산 하며와 함께 작동는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator>에서 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>(같은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) 만들도록 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 표시 되는 항목에 대 한 요소입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: The following lists describes cases when the VirtualizingPanel cannot virtualize item containers: - The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> contains item containers of different types.
trans-unit.target: 다음 목록에서 VirtualizingPanel 항목 컨테이너를 가상화 할 수 없을 때 사례에 설명:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>서로 다른 형식의 컨테이너의 항목을 포함 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> might have items that use both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> objects as the item containers.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>함께 사용 하는 항목이 있을 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>개체 컨테이너의 항목으로.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: - You explicitly create the item containers to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
For more information about explicitly versus implicitly creating item containers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 명시적으로 대 암시적 항목 컨테이너에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> 를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: When a VirtualizingPanel is virtualizing item containers, you may need to save state information that is associated with a container instead of with the data item itself.
trans-unit.target: VirtualizingPanel 항목 컨테이너를 가상화 할 때 데이터 항목 자체를 사용 하 여 대신 컨테이너와 연결 된 상태 정보를 저장 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if an item is contained by an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> state is bound to the item container, and not to the data item itself.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 항목이 포함 된 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander>컨트롤은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>데이터 항목 자체 아닌 항목 컨테이너에 바인딩된 상태.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander> is reused for a new item, the current value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> is used for the new item.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander>에 새 항목의 현재 값에 대 한 다시 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>새 항목에 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the old item does not retain its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 또한 저장 된 기존 항목이 유지 하지 않는 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>값.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> class.

Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*> collection of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 추가 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*>의 컬렉션을 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 요소.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*>

trans-unit.source: This method offers better performance for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements that virtualize their child collection than does the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법에 대 한 더 나은 성능을 제공 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>보다 자신의 자식 컬렉션을 가상화 하는 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> child to add to the collection.
When implemented in a derived class, generates the item at the specified index location and makes it visible.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 구현 된 경우 지정된 된 인덱스 위치에 있는 항목을 생성 하 고 표시 되도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the item that is generated and made visible.
trans-unit.target: 생성 되 고 표시 될 수 있는 항목의 인덱스 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: Generates the item at the specified index location and makes it visible.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스 위치에 있는 항목을 생성 하 고 표시 되도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the item that is generated and made visible.
trans-unit.target: 생성 되 고 표시 될 수 있는 항목의 인덱스 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 그룹화 또는 계층 구조로 구성 하는 항목을 가상화 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CanHierarchicallyScrollAndVirtualizeCore%2A>.
A value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 값 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 그룹화 또는 계층 구조로 구성 하는 항목을 가상화 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 그룹화 또는 계층 구조로 구성 하는 항목을 가상화 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> and support virtualizing items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy should override this method to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 상속 된 클래스 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>그룹화 또는 계층 구조로 구성 하는 항목을 가상화 지원을 반환 하려면이 메서드를 재정의 해야 하 고 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> property.
The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> attached property from.
The size of the cache before and after the viewport when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> is virtualizing.
trans-unit.target: 뷰포트 전후 캐시의 크기는 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 에서 가상화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*> property.
The default is of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit>.
The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*> attached property from.
The type of unit that is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> property.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*> property.
The default is of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable%2A> attached property `true`.
The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*> attached property from.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> should virtualize an item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 항목 가상화 해야, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing*> attached property.
The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A> property is `true`.
The object from which the attached property value is read.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 속성 값을 읽어올 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> is virtualizing its content; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 콘텐츠를 가상화 되 고, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*> property.
The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping%2A> property is `false`.
The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*> attached property from.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> virtualizes the grouped items in its collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 그룹화 된 항목의 컬렉션에는 가상화 그렇지 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the specified item, relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 항목의 위치를 기준으로 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.GetItemOffsetCore%2A>.
The element whose position to find.
The position of the specified item, relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 항목에 대 한 상대 위치는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the specified item, relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 항목의 위치를 기준으로 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> should override this method to return the position `child`, relative to the panel.
trans-unit.target: 상속 된 클래스 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>위치를 반환 하려면이 메서드를 재정의 해야 `child`패널에.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>

trans-unit.source: The element whose position to find.
0 in all cases.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*> property.
The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollUnit>.
The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*> attached property from.
A value that indicates whether scrolling is measured as items in the collection or as pixels.
trans-unit.target: 픽셀 또는 컬렉션의 항목으로 스크롤 측정 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*> attached property for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*>연결 된 지정된 된 개체에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*>

trans-unit.source: The object from which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*> property is read.
One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the object uses container recycling.
trans-unit.target: 개체가 컨테이너 재활용을 사용 하는지 여부를 지정 하는 열거형 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*> collection of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> element at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 추가 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*>의 컬렉션은 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 요소의 지정된 된 인덱스 위치에.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*>

trans-unit.source: This method offers better performance for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements that virtualize their child collection than does the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법에 대 한 더 나은 성능을 제공 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>보다 자신의 자식 컬렉션을 가상화 하는 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The index position within the collection at which the child element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 자식 요소가 삽입 되는 컬렉션 내의 인덱스 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> child to add to the collection.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets a value that identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
Called when the collection of child elements is cleared by the base <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 기본의 선택을 취소 하면 자식 요소의 컬렉션을 호출 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 될 때 호출는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>연관 된 컬렉션의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> 이 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes child elements from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*> collection.

This method offers better performance for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements that virtualize their child collection than does the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.RemoveRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법에 대 한 더 나은 성능을 제공 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>보다 자신의 자식 컬렉션을 가상화 하는 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.RemoveRange%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.RemoveRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The beginning index position within the collection at which the first child element is removed.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 자식 요소가 제거 되 고 컬렉션 내에서 시작 인덱스 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The total number of child elements to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 제거할 자식 요소의 총 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*> attached property.
To be added.
Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> attached property.
The cache is the amount of space above or below the viewport in which items are not virtualized.
trans-unit.target: 캐시는 위 또는 아래 항목 가상화 되지은 뷰포트 간격입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use a cache to avoid generating [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements as they’re scrolled into view.
trans-unit.target: 캐시를 사용 하 여 생성 되지 않도록 하려면 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 요소 뷰로 스크롤할 하는 대로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A> property determines the unit of measurement that is used by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A>.
The object to set the property on.
The size of the cache before and after the viewport when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> is virtualizing.
trans-unit.target: 뷰포트 전후 캐시의 크기는 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 에서 가상화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*> attached property.
The object to set the property on.
The type of unit that is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> property.
Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*> attached property.
The object to set the property on.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> should virtualize an item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>해당는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 항목 가상화 해야, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizingProperty"></xref> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 값을 설정 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizingProperty"> </xref> 연결 된 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to which the attached property value is set.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 속성 값에 설정 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> is virtualizing; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> 가상화 되지 않았으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*> attached property.
The object to set the property on.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> virtualizes the grouped items in its collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>되도록 지정 하려면는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> 해당 컬렉션에 그룹화 된 항목을 가상화 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*> attached property.
The object to set the property on.
A value that indicates whether scrolling is measured as items in the collection or as pixels.
trans-unit.target: 픽셀 또는 컬렉션의 항목으로 스크롤 측정 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*> attached property on the specified object.
The element on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*> property.
One of the enumeration values that specifies whether `element` uses container recycling.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 열거형 값 중 하나 여부 `element` 컨테이너 재생을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a changed item in an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> affects the layout for this panel.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 반환 여부는 변경 된 항목에는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> 이 패널에 대 한 레이아웃에 영향을 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the changed item is a direct child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the changed item is an indirect descendant of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>변경된 된 항목의이 직접 자식인 경우 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 변경 된 항목의 간접는 하위 항목을는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Contains data regarding the changed item.
trans-unit.target: 변경된 된 항목에 대 한 데이터를 포함합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the changed item in an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> affects the layout for this panel; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
